name: tsv1
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool odam.
Tool description: ODAM
API description: Fetch metadata attributes for all subsets of a given dataset from the ODAM API.

dataset.description: The identifier for the dataset whose metadata is to be fetched.

format.description: The desired format of the response (e.g., 'tsv', 'json'). Defaults to 'tsv'.
